title: Development and validation of an MRI and clinicopathological factors prediction model for low anterior resection syndrome in anterior resection of middle and low rectal cancer
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Zheng Wang, Chuanji Zhou, Linghou Meng, Xianwei Mo, Dong Xie, Xiaoliang Huang, Xinxin He, Shanshan Luo, Haiquan Qin, Qiang Li, Shaolv Lai
